pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.3.1: “Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.5: vayhaṁ ratho sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.7: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
